articles.title: Coronavirus updates: More states easing lockdowns as U.S. deaths near 55,000 - CBS News
articles.description: Almost 1 million people have contracted the disease in the U.S., where both deaths and infections continue to rise at a worrisome rate.

articles.author: Anna Kam
articles.title: New Zealand claims 'elimination' of coronavirus with new cases in single digits - CNN
articles.description: New Zealand claimed Monday it had "eliminated" the coronavirus as the country announced the easing of restrictions from "level four" to "level three," with new cases in single figures.
